DocAttribute.Name: InnerFilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the outer contour of rectangle are equally rounded. If not given, zero (= no rounding arcs) applies.

DocAttribute.Name: OuterFilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the outer contour of rectangle are equally rounded. If not given, zero (= no rounding arcs) applies.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The wall thickness shall be smaller than the X and Y dimension of the rectangle.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR32
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The outer fillet radius (if given) shall be smaller than or equal to the X and Y dimension of the rectangle.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR33
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inner fillet radius (if given) shall be smaller than or equal to the X and Y dimension of the rectangle minus the wall thickness.
